name: 5-Minute Thai Chili Oil Recipe
description: This quick and easy Thai chili oil recipe takes less than 5 minutes to make and only needs 5 simple ingredients!

recipeInstructions.text: Finely slice the garlic and quarter the shallots.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely slice the garlic and quarter the shallots.

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan or wok, heat a neutral oil over medium heat. Add garlic and shallots, frying until they turn golden brown. You have the option to either keep them in the condiment or remove them.
recipeInstructions.name: In a saucepan or wok, heat a neutral oil over medium heat. Add garlic and shallots, frying until they turn golden brown. You have the option to either keep them in the condiment or remove them.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off the heat and add dried chili flakes and golden mountain sauce, gently stirring to blend the flavors. Let the oil cool down before transferring it to a jar.
